channel.title: 317 (Bluur) WebClient. model path issue
channel.description: hello, i've been able to make a webclient working, but im still having an issue with newer models, e,g statius warhammer, vesta longsword. etc. i have all the models required in the models folder. located in client.jar. i have all the int's required in class 8. when i go in game and use the add model command it says 'cant find model xxxx' and when i used the add models command it says 'syntax: ::add model <path>' the syntax i used was: add models <./models/> and add models ./models/ but so far. no effect. whats the correct path? can anyone help me with this? thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 09:24:50 pm[/size][hr]never mind. tried to add the models before jarring the client. and that solved it.

item.title: 317 (Bluur) WebClient. model path issue
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

hello,
i’ve been able to make a webclient working, but im still having an issue with newer models, e,g statius warhammer, vesta longsword. etc.
i have all the models required in the models folder. located in client.jar. i have all the int’s required in class 8.
when i go in game and use the add model command it says ‘cant find model xxxx’ and when i used the add models command it says 'syntax: ::add model ’ the syntax i used was: add models <./models/> and add models ./models/
but so far. no effect. whats the correct path?
can anyone help me with this? thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 09:24:50 pm[/size][hr]never mind.
tried to add the models before jarring the client. and that solved it.

Read full topic
